command.play.filter_warning.title: Warning
command.play.filter_warning.description:
Effects detected in operation,
This may cause the music sound to be distorted (accelerated, pitch raised, etc.),
If this is not what you expect, you can turn them off using the effects commands
The command name is usually equal to the effect name, such as `/timescale` to control the Timescale effect

The following effects are currently running:
